thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: Judd Abramson
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Judd Abramson

author: Judd Abramson
title: Judd Abramson
text:
I've never had a better customer service experience than with Brian Gavin. I bought my wife's engagement ring (spoiler alert: she loved it) and now her matching wedding band. Actually, when we realized there was no exact match being featured on the site, the customer service team responded to our inquiry same day and offered to customize our band so that it would match the engagement ring at no additional charge. My wife was ecstatic (and by proxy, someone very close to her as well).
They really go above and beyond. I will be coming back again.
